doc.field: * 2 booklets of "Index." * 8 booklets with letters of GCD [George C. Durell], MJD [Mary Jane Durell], (mostly) ESD [Elizabeth S. Durell], MAD [Margaret A. Durell], and JSHD [John Samuel H. Durell] (1820s-60s). * 8 booklets labeled "Miscellaneous letters"; these range from 1806-1860s and include letters to various members of the Durell family. These include many letters to Daniel Meserve Durell from 1806-09 when he was a Representative in Washington, DC, and these seem to refer to political matters of the time. * 3 booklets of EHD investment transaction correspondence and accounts with the firm of John J. Cisco & Son (1870s-80s). * 6 booklets concerning Mary S. Durell's efforts to market a steam radiator for which she held patent number 347,476 (1880s). * 5 booklets of calling cards.
